statements: SELECT * FROM data_subject_requests;
SELECT id, data_subject_name, request_status FROM data_subject_requests WHERE request_type = 'Access';
SELECT request_date, data_subject_name, data_subject_email FROM data_subject_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT data_category, COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM data_subject_requests GROUP BY data_category;
SELECT * FROM data_subject_requests WHERE request_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY request_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_subject_requests WHERE request_status = 'Approved';
SELECT request_type, request_date, data_subject_name FROM data_subject_requests WHERE data_category = 'Financial Data' ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT data_subject_email, request_date, request_status FROM data_subject_requests WHERE request_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM data_subject_requests WHERE data_subject_name LIKE '%John%' AND request_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY request_date ASC;
SELECT data_subject_name, data_subject_email, request_status FROM data_subject_requests WHERE request_type = 'Access Request' AND data_category = 'Personal Information';
SELECT * FROM data_subjects;
SELECT name, email FROM data_subjects WHERE dob = '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM data_subjects WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, name, email FROM data_subjects ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT id, request_type, request_date FROM data_requests WHERE request_type = 'Access Request';
SELECT * FROM data_subjects WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM data_subjects WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM data_requests WHERE request_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT data_requests.request_id, data_subjects.name FROM data_requests JOIN data_subjects ON data_requests.subject_id = data_subjects.id;
SELECT * FROM data_subjects ORDER BY name DESC, dob ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_subjects;
SELECT name, email FROM data_subjects;
SELECT id, address FROM data_subjects;
SELECT * FROM access_requests WHERE status='pending';
SELECT data_subject_id, request_date FROM access_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM data_subjects WHERE address = '123 Main St'
SELECT * FROM access_requests WHERE request_type = 'DELETE' ORDER BY request_date DESC
SELECT data_subject_id, COUNT(*) AS total_corrections FROM data_corrections GROUP BY data_subject_id
SELECT * FROM data_subjects WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' OR email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT d.id, d.name, c.correction_date FROM data_subjects d JOIN data_corrections c ON d.id = c.data_subject_id
SELECT * FROM data_subjects_request;
SELECT subject_name, request_type, request_date FROM data_subjects_request WHERE request_id=1;
SELECT subject_name, request_type FROM data_subjects_request ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_request_details WHERE request_status='pending';
SELECT request_id, data_subject_id, correction_data FROM correction_requests WHERE request_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM data_subjects_request;
SELECT subject_name, request_type FROM data_subjects_request WHERE request_date <= '2021-01-01';
SELECT request_id, data_subject_id, request_status FROM access_request_details ORDER BY request_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM correction_requests WHERE correction_data LIKE '%important%';
SELECT deletion_reason FROM deletion_requests WHERE request_status = 'pending' ORDER BY request_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_subjects;
SELECT id, name, email, address FROM data_subjects WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, email FROM data_subjects WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT id, name, email, address, phone_number FROM data_subjects ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM data_subjects WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_subjects WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT name, email, address FROM data_subjects WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM information_access_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC
SELECT data_subject_id, status FROM correction_requests WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM deletion_requests
